title: Celebrate at JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar
text:
Company : JW Mariott, Mumbai Sahar Tuesday, September 22, 2015 6:57PM IST (1:27PM GMT) Celebrate at JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar An exquisite cake gallery at JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar from 19th - 25th September 2015 Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar kick starts the festive season with their campaign ‘Celebrate at JW Sahar’ which will showcase a cake exhibition at the lobby from 19 th to 25 th September 2015. The hotel will showcase 50 customized cakes based on various themes such as casino, beaches, swimming pool, Bollywood, Hollywood, cheese and book cake, baseball, car themed cake, fashion themed cake, painting set cake and a variety of traditional wedding cakes to name a few. Guests can order cakes in different flavors such as Crunchy Hazelnut Almond Marzipan, Toffee Coffee, Caramelized pineapple cake, Red Velvet, Chocolate Truffle and Dry fruit cake. Also, to showcase alongside the cake exhibition is the first ever life size replica of the beautiful chandelier that adorns the lobby of JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar, made from chocolate. Chef Santosh Rawat, Executive Pastry Chef, JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar will be leading this cake exhibit. Commenting on the same, he says, “We at JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar have designed an elegant and eclectic gamut of scrumptious cakes, keeping in mind the impeccable taste of our guests. Our guests can taste a few flavours of the cakes exhibited and place their orders at the JW Baking Company. The replica of our chandelier in chocolate will surely be a visual delight for our guests”. Chef Santosh Rawat has to his credit over 13 years of experience in Bakery operations in the hospitality industry in India. Currently, he is the Executive Pastry Chef with JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar. He possesses extensive experience in setting up a Pastry/ Bakery unit and in creating menus. His forte is flavors and textures which he is incredible at. Chef Santosh Rawat has gained his commendable experience over the years at different 5 star properties like Grand Hyatt Mumbai, Shangri-la Abu-Dhabi, JW Marriott Chandigarh. Venue: Lobby, JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar Date: 19 th – 25 th , September 2015 Time: 9am – 8pm For inquiries, please contact us on: 022 28538656 About JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar opens doors to effortless elegance and sophistication. Located 1 km away from the Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport Mumbai; making it an ideal destination for business and stay. With 585 intimate rooms, the property offers authentic cuisines crafted with passion, care and local flavours. With over 56,000 sq.ft. of indoor and outdoor convention space, the property offers 11 well-appointed meeting rooms with state-of-the-art conferencing facilities. The holistic Spa by JW offers a host of therapies to help you relax. At crafted perfectly so you are always left with the experience and luxury you truly desire.
